mapper.insert: INSERT INTO ai_client_system_prompt (prompt_id, prompt_name, prompt_content, description, status, create_time, update_time) VALUES (#{promptId}, #{promptName}, #{promptContent}, #{description}, #{status}, #{createTime}, #{updateTime})
mapper.select: SELECT id, prompt_id, prompt_name, prompt_content, description, status, create_time, update_time FROM ai_client_system_prompt ORDER BY id
